entries.npc_reset_3: If you think you can handle this job later, come back and see me.
entries.npc_reset_2: If you think you can handle this job later, come back and see me.
entries.npc_reset_1: If you think you can handle this job later, come back and see me.
entries.player_sorry_6: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_6: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_5: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_5: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_4: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_4: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_3_3: Let me guess. You want me to surreptitiously meet a total stranger out in the middle of nowhere and hand them a stack of credits while beating off angry predators.
entries.player_sorry_3: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_3: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.notit_3: That isn't the message you were supposed to give me.
entries.gotowork_3: What happened to the message you were supposed to bring?
entries.npc_smuggle_3: I'll bring this to Lasha straight away.
entries.dontknowyou_3: I'm waiting for somebody. Good luck to you.
entries.otherescort_3: I don't think I'm the one you're looking for.
entries.npc_failure_3: I'm sorry you ran into all that trouble. I hope you're all right.
entries.npc_noloc_3: I need to find out where you'll be meeting the courier. Would you mind stepping outside for a few minutes while I make this call?
entries.npc_work_3: Have you delivered that message yet? It really is urgent.
entries.npc_reward_3: You're an invaluable aide. I really must see about hiring you on full-time.
entries.npc_backtowork_3: Are you going to deliver my message or not?
entries.npc_4_3: Entirely correct -- except for the part about the credits. I just want you to deliver a message to a business associate. Can I count on you?
entries.npc_3_3: I guess I should stick with my regular employees.
entries.npc_2_3: Jeter Corona is a courier for an associate named Lasha Bindari. Please give him this urgent message to pass on to her.
entries.npc_1_3: Ah, there's my go-getter. How would you feel about delivering another message for me? I'm much more confident in your abilities over those of my regular employees. What do you say?
entries.player_3_2: Am I supposed to make an appointment to pummel him into cooperating or something?
entries.player_sorry_2: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_2: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.notit_2: This is not the item you were supposed to give me. You might want to look again.
entries.npc_smuggle_2: Krast is gonna love this. I totally got the goods on that CSA guy in Coronet. If this got out he'd be finished.
entries.npc_breech_2: I think you're looking for me.
entries.dontknowyou_2: My business is not with you.
entries.otherescort_2: I'm sorry, I don't know where the person you're looking for is.
entries.npc_failure_2: This isn't working quite like I expected but I'm sure we'll get past it in time.
entries.npc_noloc_2: Come back to see me in a little while. I should get the rendezvous point any time now.
entries.npc_work_2: Have you met with that data slicer yet? He's probably wondering where you are.
entries.npc_reward_2: This is good news indeed. It always helps to have a friend in the CSA who's eager to cooperate.
entries.npc_backtowork_2: I've told you all you need to know. Are you going to go or not?
entries.npc_4_2: Ha-ha! I really do like your style. Refreshingly straightforward. No, I recently paid a data slicer to examine his records and I just want you to pick up his report. Appointment for pummeling -- ha, ha! I love it! So will you do it?
entries.npc_3_2: How disappointing, I thought we were just starting to work well together.
entries.npc_2_2: I'm glad to hear it. The slicer is known as Fugue. Why is it slicers are never called anything normal?  Like Hank maybe. Just once I'd like to meet a slicer named Hank. But I digress, meet Fugue and bring me his report.
entries.npc_1_2: The Corporate Sector Authority representative in Coronet has been causing me a lot of difficulties recently and I'm starting to wonder if he's completely on the up and up. Do you think you could help me out with this?
entries.player_3_1: What kind of errands do you have in mind?
entries.player_sorry_1: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_1: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.notit_1: That's not the disk I was told to expect. Look again.
entries.gotowork_1: You lost the disk you were supposed to bring me? What happened to it?
entries.npc_smuggle_1: This will put things in a different light. You tell Krast not to worry. It'll all be taken care of.
entries.npc_breech_1: Perfect timing, I just got here myself.
entries.dontknowyou_1: I'm waiting here to meet somebody else.
entries.otherescort_1: I'm waiting here to meet somebody else.
entries.npc_failure_1: That's not a very good start to our relationship, is it? No matter, I'm sure you'll do better next time.
entries.npc_noloc_1: Come and see me in a little while. I need to find out where I should have him meet you.
entries.npc_work_1: I was hoping you would have delivered that disk by now. Shouldn't you get on with that?
entries.npc_reward_1: Come see me again if you want to handle another errand for me.
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Are you going to make that delivery or not?
entries.npc_4_1: To start with, there's a delivery you could make for me. Some investigators are looking into some questionable shipping practices and I have some information that could be very valuable to the investigation. Will you do it?
entries.npc_2_1: Take this datadisc to Banyon Craddok, he's an investigator I've helped a time or two in the past. He'll know what to do with it. You may want to keep an eye out for Black Sun. I think they may be involved in this.
entries.npc_1_1: I like your style. Not everybody has the moxie to walk right up to a Corellian Engineering Corporation bigwig and just start chatting. If you want a little temporary work, I think I could help you out with a few errands. Interested?
entries.npc_reset: If you think you can handle this job later, come back and see me.
entries.cantwork: Sorry, I can't hire you if you're working for somebody else.
entries.next: That's all the work I have for you right now. I'll keep you in mind if anything else comes my way.
